title: Connected Investors Property Enricher
description: Enriches foreclosure data from Supabase with contact information from Connected Investors

username.title: Username or Email
username.description: Your Connected Investors username or email

apiBaseUrl.title: API Base URL
apiBaseUrl.description: Base URL for your API (e.g., https://as-is-app.vercel.app)

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Number of properties to process in each batch

maxRetries.title: Max Retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retries for failed properties

skipAlreadyEnriched.title: Skip Already Enriched
skipAlreadyEnriched.description: Skip properties that already have contact information
